portal-chamber.name: Portal chamber
portal-chamber.description: You see four portal stations, blue, green, red, and yellow. The yellow one isn't working, but the other three are. You also notice a writing on the wall: 'Follow the Ridiculously Gorgeous and Greatly Rusty Radish.'

portal-puzzel-step-1.message: You are send back to the middle of the room, but the yellow portal station, something starts to glow.

portal-puzzel-step-2.message: Send back again, but the glow starts to increase in size and brightness.

portal-puzzel-step-2-fail.message: The glow that was there a second ago disappeared again.

portal-puzzel-step-3.message: The glow grows again, it starts to look like a portal, but too small.

portal-puzzel-step-3-fail.message: The glow that was growing has now disappeared.

portal-puzzel-step-4.message: The portal size increases again, but isn't as large as the other portals yet.

portal-puzzel-step-4-fail.message: The small portal grows smaller and then disappears leaving some shiny particles that dim slowly until they're gone.

portal-puzzel-step-5.message: The yellow portal now has a normal size, you can probably use it now.

portal-puzzel-step-5-fail.message: The portal starts to pulsate faster and faster until it explodes leaving an empty portal station once again.
